Review.Contenu: Summarizing the absurd error that occurred, to avoid wasting the entire day writing the review, I paid for a macOS VPS, and what did I receive? Nothing!Support said they can neither refund me nor activate the service.Great, I will certainly recommend you to all my friends.Thank you very much.

Hi Everyone .I hope you are doing great. The 9 November i bought  dedicated server from ultahosting. The package name is Dedicated Servers - ULTA100 XEON and also you can check specs below down: CPU Intel® Xeon® E-2276G Hexa-Core64 GB DDR4 RAM2x 960 GB SSD DiskData Transfer Unlimited1 dedicated IPs1 GB Port speedFree 1-year SSL certificateI bought this plan and after 10 hour he setup everything fine but when i access the ubuntu server through ssh client to verify the processor he did not provide me the same processor which i got an order. After i told their technical team he said we dont have this server that's why dont give you this server. Her give me intel xeon 2176G server which is very very slow and also site load is too much. i asked the team to refund my amount he said we did not give you refund. I recommended you everyone please dont buy their service.

Review.Titre: Terrible customer service, incompetens sales people
Review.Contenu: We are a user of dedicated service hosting services for this company for about 4 months.The company uses an external payment provider. That provider has double-collected payments from our cards.The company (Ultahost) could not resolve the issue properly and when we have applied for a conflict resolution (chargeback request), they threatened us with stopping our services although we have over 2 months worth of services in our credit balance because of these double booking refunds.We are of course looking for an alternative firm to carry our server over within a few weeks.

I had an absolutely dreadful experience with Ultahost.com, and I feel compelled to share my frustration. I signed up for their services with high hopes, but unfortunately, they delivered nothing but disappointment.Firstly, their service quality was abysmal. The website loading times were slow, and I frequently encountered downtime issues. This made it extremely difficult to run my online business effectively, leading to a loss of customers and revenue.To make matters worse, I reached out to their customer support multiple times to address these issues, but the response was painfully slow and unhelpful. It felt like I was talking to a wall, as my concerns were brushed off without any real solutions or explanations.As if this wasn't bad enough, when I finally decided I had enough and requested a refund, Ultahost.com proved to be just as disappointing in that aspect. They flat-out refused to process a refund, despite their clear failure to deliver the promised service.In the end, I wasted both my time and money on Ultahost.com, and I would strongly advise anyone considering their services to steer clear. They are unreliable, unresponsive, and have no regard for customer satisfaction. My experience has been nothing short of a nightmare, and I regret ever doing business with them.

Review.Titre: I'm new and all my VPS having network…
Review.Contenu: I'm new and all my VPS having network outages, websites on all VPS are down many times per day, their status page about outages doesnt say anything..

** Update: They keep trying to get this review removed from Trustpilot for making up things by saying this review isn't for them. This review is for you UltaHost. Moving to one star now.I started using UltaHost a few days ago. I ordered a VPS from them. Well we started having issues running two very low end websites which the first VPS server should've handled with no issue. Both websites were lagging and the CPU was jumping to 100%. Support told me I needed more resources, I didn't think this was true but I went ahead and spent more money. BUT that didn't fix it either. I reached out to another host and we set up the same two sites on one of their VPS and it ran with no issues. Not even above 50% CPU. This new VPS has the same specs as the UltaHost server. I reached out to billing to request a refund. They refunded the first cost of the stage 1 VPS but they refuse to refund the cost of the upgrade which was $78. Per their terms, I get that. However support told me that I needed more resources which didn't help at all. This was recommended by staff. The gave me credit, which I won't use because their hardware is unstable.The support team was alright.I would recommend spending more money with another host so you don't have these issues.

Review.Titre: I thought it was a joke but no..
Review.Contenu: I thought it was a joke but no... It happens for real. After two weeks wondering what's wrong in my setup and after some mails with my broker I asked UH support why my server latency is so slow for my NY trading... They answer it's normal I asked for a Los Angeles location. So I send my bill where it was written I asked for a NY location with a 2016 server. No apologies, no compensation. Just cold answer as it was my fault. After a night I receive my new login and password to reinstall everything in NY... On a 2022 server... OMG what is wrong with this company?

LOL they are scammer and lyer. Deleting files 2 times, False promises and then they want 20 usd for each easy reinstall..We also get forced to give fake reviews with 5 stars or they will terminate our server..

Review.Titre: In my many years of onlinComplete Scam - Dishonest and Incompetente business…
Review.Contenu: In my many years of online business UltaHost is by far the worst web host I have ever dealt with. To start the live “support” rep will blatantly lie to get you to sign up. After they migrated my websites literally nothing worked…database, email and ssl. Based on the quick live chat I expected a quick fix but instead the support tickets were just ignored. Chasing it only got me templated responses and attitude. After my websites being down the whole day and nobody being willing to help I switched to a different web host. At least they offered a 30-day money back guarantee…or so they advertised across their site. Turns out they have various clauses to deny refunds to 99% of clients. You’d think their 99.99% uptime guarantee would cover me instead….nope another meaningless fraudulent “guarantee”. Now I am pursuing a chargeback with my credit card company. The following day they apparently got the hosting working acknowledging their mistakes in setting it up. Also despite multiple requests to cancel my account it is still active which I assume is another part of their scam. Stay far away from this web host. Complete incompetence and complete lack of ethics.UPDATE: Their claims about their refund policy are nonsense.  It is structured so that 99% of clients don't qualify, yet all over their website they brag about 30 day money back guarantee.  If a company is going to promote a certain benefit it needs to apply to more than a tiny percentage of people otherwise it is something they could get sued over.  I'll just get my money back via a credit card chargeback as these guys are crooks.Repeatedly Ultahost has tried to get this review removed by claiming I am not a legit customer.  Clearly this is a tactic they do hoping that people don't save their receipts.

One word horrible, they oversell everything on their website and deliver nothing in return; their cheap hosting plans are what they are cheap because I think they run their servers out of someone's mom's basement. You get what you pay for in this case, and you get a lot less. All the 5-star reviews are from friends and family. Stay away from this hosting company unless you like headaches and stress.This is a response to the below statement; you are incorrect. I have chat logs for proof; your support was nonexistent, and you ignored all my requests.And did not provide what I paid for. You are well established only in your fantasy. You are scammers.

i tried this hosting company for 2 hours only!i paid $19 via Paypal.after testing i found it was a slow hosting and had big delay when opening my website!i asked for cancellation and refund, then they cancelled my plan and did not refund me!after contacting them they said the refund was in progress! but that was a fake .THEY ARE CHEATERS . BAD SERVICE AT ALL

Review.Titre: Good deal but shocking billing practices
Review.Contenu: They offer competitive pricing, but terribly confusing and predatory billing practices. I chose to close one of the hosting products with them (as many people do) and requested a refund within the 30-day initial period. They made the process insanely difficult and continued to invoice me for a Mac VPS that was cancelled. They took over $60 from my bank account and insisted upon issuing it as a credit for future use with them rather than reversing the erroneous charge. They respond with very long, clearly canned email responses that do not address your concern at all. I tried hard to make them understand the nature of this issue but they kept denying responsibility. Stay away from them if you do not like bureaucracy and shady billing practices. I see most of their responses to negative reviews are mean and trying to shame the customer for doing something wrong. This is clear evidence of a business that does not like to accept responsibility when it has done something wrong. However it's true what they say sometimes, you get what you pay for, and it's on me for choosing a not-so-reputable, small hosting provider.Edit: It looks like they have issued another canned response that is completely tone deaf to the original situation. First of all the cancellation request was made within 30-days of the original month refund timeline. Second, the complaint is regarding me being charged for months after cancelling said service with them.

wrost hosting packages i use 1.shared host  for 2 years 2.vps 1.5 year3.vds 9 month4.windows host 2 monthslow and down many times i have full record for donw times don't buy host from this !!!!!

I opted for ULTA HOST with the hope of receiving consistent and reliable hosting services, but unfortunately, my experience has been less than satisfactory. The downtime has been significant, which, for any business, can translate to potential losses and frustrated customers. Furthermore, whenever I sought clarity regarding the server changes and the resultant downtime, I was never given a clear or precise reason. This lack of transparency and communication is concerning. A heads-up or some communication would've been appreciated, as such changes have a direct impact on my operations. I sincerely hope ULTA HOST takes this feedback seriously and works towards better customer communication, transparency, and improved service reliability.UPDATED:Team ULTAHOST knows that this is a genuine review and i'm using their services but they are flagging the review on trust pilot that the review is fake. Literally this company is full of unprofessionals.

They are supposed to take my payments automatically every month but every single month they don’t do that and my account gets automatically suspended until I put in a complaint, they say they will fix this but following month happens again, hopeless

I left Ultahost after only 2 weeks. I paid a year up front and they will NOT refund the money. RIPOFF COMPANY! When I signed up I wanted to make sure the dedicated server was in the USA. They said it doesn't matter where the server is in the world. YES IT DOES! I'm in the USA and the server was in Germany. They never answered me as to where the server was. The dedicated server had issues with site load times of 25 seconds! It took a week for them to "fix" the issue, which was removing cpanel and replacing it with a free, cheaper-looking cpanel clone. That's not a fix. My site was down for a week. They offered to move the server to a USA server, at twice the cost, and what I wanted in the first place! Techs support only works through tickets via their site. Maybe it takes a few hours or a couple days to fix. When I had a question on server slowness, one of the techs responded by saying "I'm talking crazy" and "My thoughts are not right." They are vain and I never felt comfortable asking questions. I was reminded by them how they are the best and their customer service shines. It doesn't. I cancelled after this 2 week disaster. They refuse to refund money for the server I used for only 2 weeks and paid a year for! They don't do refunds. They saw this review within an hour and threatened to take it down. They care more about their reputation online than supporting customers. I'd stay clear of ultahost. I never felt comfortable. They got paid a full year for 2 weeks of bad use. They said they will respond to this review with a copy of their policy, which says no refunds. They also said they will have my review removed. Any other hosting company would refund the difference for months not used. If you're ok with no refunds, slow tech support via ticketing system and vain remarks, this is the company for you.
Hosting with 29% uptime, it's always down
They don’t care about their customers feel. They just want you to make payment and leave

Review.Titre: Extremely Disappointed with UltaHost's Lack of Responsiveness
Review.Contenu: I regret to say that my experience with UltaHost as a hosting company has been nothing short of a nightmare. I have encountered a serious issue of fraudulent activity running on their hosting, and my attempts to contact them for assistance have been met with utter disappointment. Their unresponsiveness and lack of support have left me frustrated and disillusioned.I initially reached out to UltaHost via email, hoping to alert them to the fraudulent activity taking place on their platform. However, despite multiple attempts, I did not receive a single response from their customer support team. It is deeply concerning that a company entrusted with the responsibility of hosting websites does not take immediate action when notified about fraudulent activities. Their negligence raises serious questions about their commitment to maintaining a secure and trustworthy hosting environment.In an attempt to seek a resolution, I also tried engaging with their live chat agents. Unfortunately, my interactions with them only added to my frustrations. Instead of providing meaningful assistance, the agents simply directed me to resend my emails repeatedly, leading to a never-ending loop of unproductive communication. It was disheartening to witness their inability or unwillingness to address my concerns and provide a satisfactory solution.As a customer, I expect a hosting company to prioritize the security and well-being of its users. UltaHost's failure to acknowledge and promptly address the fraudulent activity on their platform is a clear indication of their disregard for customer safety. The lack of attention given to serious issues and the dismissive behavior of their support staff demonstrate a severe lack of professionalism and commitment to customer satisfaction.

Also they do not help to refund or not solving any type of problems! They do work with wowonder together i think and this is the reason if u buy a plugin for that script they refuses to help u but they do like they help u. They also threating me that if i give all these info here they will never help me about anything on my server which also they not do it in anyway! I also do have screenshot proofs to post here and i will upload them once they throw any lia!THEY WİLL MAYBE EVEN TERMİNATE MY ACCOUNT FOR THİS REVİEW WHO KNOWS! Review.Titre: Superior Hosting Service with Speed to Match
Review.Contenu: What I value the most about UltaHost is its remarkable speed that outperforms the hosting company I was with for 15 years. My continual quest to boost my WordPress site's performance became redundant since UltaHost ensures pages load seamlessly.I'm particularly fond of their pick-and-choose method for add-ons, as it allows me to only pay for what I find necessary, saving me from wasting money on unneeded services. The platform is incredibly user-friendly; a simple login, a selection of the desired action or contact, and following the prompted options is all it takes. The transfer process was impressively swift, clocking in at just 3-4 hours, a stark contrast to the days I had expected it to take. Their customer service is top-notch, offering thorough explanations and help with complicated installations that are beyond my expertise.UltaHost has been a revelation for me. Its speed, intuitive interface, and stellar customer service have greatly enhanced my website's performance and my overall user experience. I strongly advocate for it to anyone seeking a dependable and effective hosting service.

Exceptional VPS Hosting Experience with UltraHostI have been using UltraHost's VPS platform for the past few months, and I am thoroughly impressed with the exceptional service they provide. From robust performance to top-notch customer support, UltraHost has exceeded my expectations in every aspect.Performance:The performance of UltraHost's VPS is nothing short of outstanding. The servers are lightning-fast, ensuring that my websites and applications load quickly and efficiently. I've experienced minimal downtime, and the reliability of their infrastructure has greatly contributed to the seamless operation of my online projects.User-Friendly Interface:Navigating UltraHost's user interface is a breeze. The control panel is intuitive and well-designed, allowing me to manage my VPS effortlessly. Whether it's deploying new applications, adjusting server settings, or monitoring resource usage, UltraHost has made it simple and user-friendly.Scalability:One of the standout features of UltraHost is its scalability. As my online projects grew, I needed a hosting solution that could adapt to increasing demands. UltraHost's VPS platform allowed me to easily scale my resources, ensuring that my websites and applications continued to perform optimally even during periods of high traffic.Reliable Customer Support:The customer support at UltraHost is truly commendable. Whenever I've had questions or encountered any issues, their support team has been quick to respond and incredibly knowledgeable. Their dedication to customer satisfaction sets them apart, and I always feel confident that any concerns will be addressed promptly.Affordable Pricing:UltraHost offers competitive and transparent pricing plans. I appreciate that there are no hidden fees, and the value I receive for the cost is exceptional. The range of plans caters to various needs, making it accessible for both small businesses and larger enterprises.Security Measures:Security is a top priority for UltraHost, and it shows. The VPS platform is equipped with robust security features, including firewalls and regular backups, providing peace of mind for me as a user. Knowing that my data is secure allows me to focus on growing my online presence without worrying about potential threats.In conclusion, UltraHost's VPS platform has proven to be a reliable, high-performance, and user-friendly hosting solution. With excellent customer support and a commitment to security, UltraHost has become my go-to choice for VPS hosting. I wholeheartedly recommend UltraHost to anyone in need of a dependable hosting service.

Review.Titre: My Stellar Hosting Experience with Ultahost: A Comprehensive Review
Review.Contenu: I recently embarked on my blogging journey, and amidst the myriad of hosting providers available, Ultahost emerged as the beacon of reliability and excellence. From the outset, Ultahost has proven to be a game-changer, offering a seamless hosting experience that has significantly elevated my blogging career.Reliability and Performance:Ultahost's unwavering commitment to reliability has been a cornerstone of my positive experience. Their servers consistently deliver optimal performance, ensuring that my blog remains accessible and responsive at all times. The uptime has been nothing short of impressive, translating to a seamless browsing experience for my audience.User-Friendly Interface:Navigating through Ultahost's user interface is a breeze, making it an ideal choice for both beginners and seasoned bloggers. The intuitive design simplifies the management of domains, databases, and other essential features, allowing me to focus on creating content rather than grappling with a complex control panel.Customer Support:Ultahost's customer support deserves special commendation. Their responsive and knowledgeable team has been a lifeline during occasional technical hiccups. Whether it's a simple query or a more complex issue, the support team at Ultahost has consistently provided prompt and effective solutions, fostering a sense of trust and reliability.Feature-Rich Hosting Packages:The array of hosting packages offered by Ultahost caters to a diverse range of needs. From shared hosting plans for beginners to more robust options for experienced bloggers, Ultahost ensures that users can find a package tailored to their specific requirements. This scalability has allowed me to seamlessly upgrade my hosting plan as my blog has grown in popularity.Affordability and Value for Money:One of the standout features of Ultahost is its affordability without compromising on quality. The hosting plans are competitively priced, offering excellent value for money. This affordability has been a boon for me, especially in the early stages of my blogging journey.In conclusion, Ultahost has not only met but exceeded my expectations as a hosting provider. The combination of reliability, user-friendly interface, exceptional customer support, feature-rich packages, and affordability positions Ultahost as the epitome of what a hosting service should be. For anyone seeking a hosting provider that goes above and beyond, Ultahost comes highly recommended based on my exceptional experience.
